title: IMqttClient
description: the configuration of the IMqttClient interface

IMqttClient.description: the configuration group, required to be present to try to connect as IMqttClient to a broker

feature.description: the name of the messaging feature to which the feature may connect (the preferred configuration)

host.description: the hostname to use to connect to the message bus (only localhost being managed for now)

port.description: the port number to use to connect to the message bus

alivePeriod.description: interval (ms) between two alive publications, defaulting to 1mn
